definition: good/well/proper/good to/easy to/very/so/(suffix indicating completion or readiness)/(of two people) close/on intimate terms/(after a personal pronoun) hello
to be fond of/to have a tendency to/to be prone to

sentences.english: The train will be ready to leave when all the carriages have been coupled.
sentences.chinese: 在所有車廂都連接好時列車即可開出。

sentences.english: Hershey's Shelf Stable Milk is a Grade A milk procured from local family-owned dairies.
sentences.chinese: “好時”耐儲存牛奶是從本地奶牛場採購的A級牛奶。

sentences.english: In a good month I might earn RMB3000 to 4000 selling kites.
sentences.chinese: 生意好時我每月可賺三四千塊錢。

sentences.english: They often ride out to the mountains when the weather is fine.
sentences.chinese: 天氣好時，他們常常騎馬到山裏去玩。

sentences.english: Scatter Hershey's Chocolate Kisses all over the bed.
sentences.chinese: 在牀上撒滿好時的巧克力。

sentences.english: I waited until the boss was in good mood before I broached the subject of my raise.
sentences.chinese: 我直等到老闆心情好時纔開始提及我的提薪問題。

sentences.english: Belinda enjoyed gardening and the couple would take trips to the seafront when the weather was fine.
sentences.chinese: 貝琳達喜歡願意，在天氣好時他們夫婦倆還會去海邊。

sentences.english: In good years, farmers increase the numbers of their cattle.
sentences.chinese: 年景好時，農民就增加牲畜飼養的頭數。

sentences.english: And in some cases these people have strong recommendations.
sentences.chinese: 如果候選人的推薦信都一樣好時。

sentences.english: In fine weather you can find many green turtles reposing on the sand.
sentences.chinese: 天氣好時你可以看到許多海龜在沙灘上養神。

sentences.english: A bee may visit 5000 blossoms a day in fine weather.
sentences.chinese: 天氣好時，一個密蜂可採5000朵花。

sentences.english: Quit when you're in a good mood.
It cannot respond to a file descriptor immediately when the data becomes ready.
sentences.chinese: 當一個文件描述符上數據準備好時，它無法立即響應。

sentences.english: Hershey could make a run for the chocolate and confectionery brands, analysts say.
sentences.chinese: 分析師說，好時食品可能鍾情於巧克力和糖果品牌。

sentences.english: As another spike was readied , I knew I could watch no more.
sentences.chinese: 當另一個長釘準備好時，我知道我不可能再看下去了。

sentences.english: Mother reminded him to air the quilt when it is fine.
sentences.chinese: 母親提醒他天氣好時曬曬被子。

definition: between/among/within a definite time or space/room/section of a room or lateral space between two pairs of pillars/classifier for rooms
gap/to separate/to thin out (seedlings)/to sow discontent
preparation/to prepare/to intend/to be about to/reserve (fund)
to agree (on a meeting place, date etc)/to reach agreement/to make an appointment
outcome/result/conclusion/in the end/as a result/to kill/to dispatch
